channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
need help with these my source is Hybrid Pvp v3 and its PI
need to change the amounts of coins you get from theiving from a stall how to fix the smelting glitch where you can only smelt one bar at a time how to change the format of PI Drop system. want to change the format to (monster id , item id , item amount, drop rarity) drop rarity 0 being every time and 1000 very rare (1 n 1000) remove pk supplies holy elixir + spirit sheild = blessed spirit shield

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @party_boiz123 party boiz123
item.description:
@party_boiz123 wrote:

holy elixir + spirit sheild = blessed spirit shield

Youd do that in the class itemonitem…

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

instead of asking other to do everything for you, you could look up some tutorials or snippets to. I’ve seen the most of what you need at the tutorials page.

at the changing amount of coins,

go into your Thieving.java and search for

read what it says under that, and you’ll find the addItem part…

Read full topic
